text: The Quiet Earth is a 1985 New Zealand science fiction movie directed by Geoff Murphy and is loosely based on the 1981 novel of the same name by Craig Harrison. It stars Bruno Lawrence, Alison Routledge, Anzac Wallace. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 science fiction movies Category:New Zealand science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Geoff Murphy Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies
title: The Quiet Earth (movie)
